name: Rainbow Figther
description:
This game was made for a demoscene party. (qbparty 2017) I won the 3rd prize with it. Special thanks for Brian for the music and for Haag Boglárka for the graphics!

MUSIC: CLICK

Controlls:

The unicorn will shot by itself also it follows the cursor

Press the 1-2-3 buttons to use powerups...
